ai-ja327:2.1_0: “What is the ocean so hard to cross?
ai-ja327:2.3_0: How are the seven substances that are the ocean?
ai-ja327:2.4_0: How is the power of patience?”
ai-ja327:3.1_0: “I’m the ocean so hard to cross,
ai-ja327:3.2_0: and you call what you doing.
ai-ja327:3.3_0: Don’t you go to the ocean
ai-ja327:3.4_0: I brought it to this army.”
ai-ja327:4.3_0: where one is born from a womb;
ai-ja327:5.1_0: on the seventh Kāsī is born in a net.
